indices.description: Specifies the accessor id (property name) storing indices for this primitive.

material.description: Specifies the material id (property name) to apply to this primitive when rendering.

primitive.description: Specifies what kind of primitives to render.  Allowed values are 0 (POINTS), 1 (LINES), 2 (LINE_LOOP), 3 (LINE_STRIP), 4 (TRIANGLES), 5 (TRIANGLE_STRIP), and 6 (TRIANGLE_FAN).
